alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 29 at 4:51AM PST until November 29 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Alpowa Summit, Tekoa, Uniontown, Colfax, Clarkston, Rosalia, Pomeroy, La Crosse, Oakesdale, and Pullman. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. Temperatures below freezing will lead to slick roads especially over bridges and lesser traveled roads.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Washington Palouse
